channel.title: debugging on Amateur Hour
channel.description: Recent content in debugging on Amateur Hour

item.title: A Debugging Story
item.description: Debugging is a core skill for software engineers, but IMO it’s one that we often neglect. There’s a ton of advice on the internet on how to be a better systems designer, or how to solve algorithms challenges (albeit mostly for interviews), but very little on how to get better at debugging. I wanted to help solve that by trying to document a real-world bug (https://github.com/HypothesisWorks/hypothesis/issues/3446 stumped me for quite some time.
